TopicTitle: I've Gone SSTO! [Warning Large block of grammar free text!!]

Articles.Content:
I was conducting a speed test using an uprated Ravenspear Mk4 (same as the stock but with twin afterburning turbojets outboard and PDE's inboard of those and a SAS unit behind the cockpit(in addition I added a ModuleGenerator to make the Mk2 fuselage generate its own fuel). I was going to try to break my previous speed record of 1,513 m/s. But I ended up in a giant suborbital arc with apoapsis at about 500,000 M, I ended the flight with out bothering to circularize I found that I had a maximum speed of about 2,878 m/s or near escape velocity(I would of kept burning but my ship was spinning as I didn't put a RCS system as I Wasn't expecting to leave the atmosphere. I didn't take pics because I was excited and I didn't really want to sign up for a Imgur acct right now.

DL link:https://www.dropbox.com/s/q4kpqzkmpvtyuwu/Ravenspear%20Mk4.craft

Edited June 23, 2013 by DarthVader
